data.title: Russell Crowe
data.meta_description:
Russell Crowe. Actor: Les Mis√©rables. Russell Ira Crowe was born in Wellington, New Zealand, to Jocelyn Yvonne (Wemyss) and John Alexander Crowe, both of whom catered movie sets. His maternal grandfather, Stanley Wemyss, was a cinematographer. Crowe's recent ancestry includes Welsh (where his paternal grandfather was born, in Wrexham), English, Irish, Scottish, Norwegian, Swedish, Italian, and Maori (one of Crowe's maternal great-grandmothers, Erana Putiputi Hayes Heihi, was Maori).

Crowe's family moved...
data.text:
Dropped out of high school.

Lobbied California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger against executing Stanley "Tookie" Williams. (December 2005)
